content:
1. Styles in Microsoft Word, including character styles and paragraph styles.
2. Creating an accessible PDF from a Word document.
3. Customizing default styles in Word.
4. Creating new styles in Word.
5. Evaluating the accessibility of a Word document.
6. Keyboard shortcuts for applying styles in Word.
7. Formatting options for improving the structure of a Word document.
8. The benefits of using styles in Word documents.
9. Applying styles to maintain consistency in a Word document.
10. Designing and implementing a set of styles to improve the accessibility and structure of a Word document.
